content.html:
I guess there is no need to change it as long as it is well documented. A pattern I've seen is something as follows, but it would be different from the rest of the ConfigWidget API... Maybe we can just keep it like this for now, I have no strong feelings about this.

      /// \brief Get density value from a child widget.
      /// \param[in] _name Name of the child widget.
      /// \param[out] _value Density value.
      /// \return True if the value is got successfully.
      public: bool DensityWidgetValue(const std::string &_name,
          double &_value);
